attributes.action: Place sex offenders who were convicted before 1997 on the sex offenders register
attributes.additional_details: Many sex offenders who were convicted before 1997, and in many cases have now been released, are not on the sex offenders register. This loophole must be closed.
attributes.background: People who were convicted of a sex offence before the sex offenders register became law are not currently on the register. This should be changed.
